Buying a product that has been released in 2014 in 2017 doesn't make much
sense... At this price point you can go for many feature rich Android phones
and if screen size isn't an issue, then iPhone 5SE is a wise choice as it has
many features of 6s. BUT if you are looking for the prestigious apple
branding, screen size, the reliability of ios, updates for at least another
2-3 years at a pocket friendly price.. then 6 is a wise choice... (Strongly
recommended to go for 32GB or 64GB variant)

title: SAD EXPERIENCE. REMEMBER IT IS ONLY 28 GB AND NOT 32GB
Worked good only for a week
I like the product however after using for a few days ...
Five Stars
iPhone 6 ( A decent phone )
Iphone at its best
Looks like a refurbished product as I found lot of other ...
Highly Satisfied.
Worth of Money
I am very happy with the phone
review:
I bought iPhone 6 in the sale this month. From delivery to the product, using
it has been a sad state of affairs.  
To start with the capacity is only 28GB and not 32GB out of which more than
6GB are used because of built in apps. So effectively you get 22GB and not 32
GB.  
The phone quality is also not what I expected being an iPhone user  
The touch sometimes stops working and there is a problem with the signal as
well which is perfect in my iPhone 5.  
Tried to initiate return but it didn’t accept.  
I hope amazon can look into it.

Bought it in Amazon sale, got a defective product. Worked good only for a
week, started giving trouble in the second week only.  
It takes more than 1 min to connect to any number, such a slow crap device.  
Amazon service not happy - they say return window got closed on 10th day of
purchase. Now i've to run behind apple service centres...

I like the product however after using for a few days I noticed that the
battery drains out rapidly, I found it little strange as I have been using the
it's predecessor for quite a long time and initially it's battery life was
good and later it's gone worse after a usage of about 2 years However I just
bought an iPhone 6 and I am really disappointed with the battery life.

Awesome product.. working awesome..got product yesterday...it's absolutely
